pci_ai_tokens_label_selector_validation_: The label selector must be in the following form: label=value
pci_ai_tokens_role_help: Choose an Administrator or Operator role (easy to use)
pci_ai_tokens_region_help: Region for which the token will be active
pci_ai_tokens_add_error: An error has occurred creating the token: {{message}}
pci_ai_tokens_add_success: Your token has been generated, please save it
pci_ai_tokens_add_info_1: Tokens can be assigned to a specific resource (AI Notebook, Job and App) using label selectors â€” or if you leave the field empty, they can be assigned to all your resources. You can also specify token privileges to include administrative or read-only rights.
pci_ai_tokens_add_info_3: By default, your applications will have the following labels: id and type
